name: Eternal warriors: Time travel
description:
You are Leo CLARK, a man with no memories, who travels through time to fight against robots trying to change the past.

You won't be alone though. You can use your skills and call allies into the battle to help you win.

Features:
Story mode, containing 42 levels (including 3 boss fights) in 3 worlds-eras (Stone Age, Ancient Greece, Middle Ages)
Survival mode: Kill as many enemies as you can and get prizes.
5 available upgrades for each of your skills and allies.
In-game tutorial
Play with keyboard or gamepad.
